Reviews.Title: Good phone when traveling abroad
Reviews.Author: S. Kshirsagar
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone to use when traveling abroad as its a quad band phone.Pros:Voice qualityFM radioGood for calling and receiving.Cons:Ringer volume is not very audible even at maximum setting.

Reviews.Title: Super cheap and... super cheap
Reviews.Author: D. Kong "DK"
Reviews.Content: The phone is light, made of plastic, and cheap as can be. Call quality is good and the built-in speaker and mic are clear enough to use in a moving car but probably not in situations much less favorable than that. It's easy enough to use but you probably won't want to do anything other than make calls. Texting is a pretty big pain coming off a smartphone. Battery life is about 3 days on standby, maybe 4 hours of talk time. Worked for me in Italy with a prepaid sim card.

Reviews.Title: How to put in the SD card
Reviews.Author: Steve Richardson
Reviews.Content: Here is a trick to save time and frustration installing an SD card in this phone.DO NOT SLIDE the SD card under the silver metal retaining clip as instructed, you will bend the contacts. Instead, use a slight downward pressure on the clip and SLIDE it toward the center of the phone. When loose raise the clip and seat the SD card into position. Then reverse the process by sliding the retaining clip toward the outside of the phone until it snaps in place. Put the battery back in and snap back the case and you are good to go.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: it is light and easy to set up and carry.  I didn't know how to set up the key guard so that when it is in my bag it doesn't make mistaken calls.  I used it in the US to test it out and it worked well.  I picked a SIM card that was for over 190 countries before leaving for Mexico. It was confusing at times, but once I figured it out, the phone worked like a gem.  It is good to have a simple phone like this for traveling to other countries.

Reviews.Title: Works great for the money
Reviews.Author: Lucas
Reviews.Content: Great functionality and use for the money spent. Used a Swisscom prepaid SIM card in Switzerland and this worked great.

Reviews.Title: Confusing instructions
Reviews.Author: PeterM
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Jenny T172, but got the T172i. Not sure what the difference is. The User Manual, besides being tiny print (you can download one online though) is useless. It doesn't explain how to use any of the main features or what they mean. For example, what are "user profiles: Meeting, Outdoor"? How do you activate the camera or video recorder (neither are listed under "Multimedia" as the manual suggests it is)? Confusing. So the review is based on setting it up. Haven't tried a SIM card yet when travelling out of the country.

Reviews.Title: Looking for an inexpensive phone for international travel - try this one.
Reviews.Author: James H. Elwood
Reviews.Content: Purchased to use as an international phone via sim purchase, and to use to maintain contact with other members of a travel group as we wandered independently. For those purposes the phone worked well and was cost effective.

Reviews.Title: Used for trip to Greece and Macedonia
Reviews.Author: Darius Hinton
Reviews.Content: Worked great! Battery life is awesome lasted the whole week with one charge! Could never figure out how to use app sharing features but mostly because the SIM cards we purchased were in different languages than our native English. Also this has 2 sim card slots and a spot for a mini SD card. Camera is decent but for the price overall this is a great product!

Reviews.Title: Works with t-mobile, great backup phone but backup phone is all it is.
Reviews.Author: William Douglas
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the small size and relatively large amount of functionality this phone provides. I used it for a few days while waiting on a repair for my phone and it was well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Battery doesn't hold charge even for half a day on standby
Reviews.Author: avom "avom"
Reviews.Content: The phone looks good. But despite the specification that the phone battery will hold standby charge for many days, it doesn't even hold charge for half a day (9-10 hrs) even when not talking at all and in a good cell signal reception area. If you actually use the phone to make calls, it lasts even less. I had even fully charged the battery per instructions before first use. Completely useless because of this.BTW, contrary to another reviewer's finding, I found the ringer to be pretty loud.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Ato
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone for the elderly who have no need for all those fancy "stuff" on phones they will certainly never use. Works just fine!

Reviews.Title: It's all right for the price but the menu's too inconvenient.
Reviews.Author: Janster
Reviews.Content: It's cheap. It has a good keypad. It's light. It holds a charge. It has a nice, bright screen. It has a camera. It has an MP3 player. It has Bluetooth. HOWEVER, the menu is hard to use. It took me forever to figure out how to find the ringtones. There aren't many ringtones. The camera isn't very good. I still haven't found the Bluetooth so I will have to get my salesperson at the dealership to pair it with the Bluetooth in my car. If the menu were a simple table of contents like on many simple phones, and I could change the volume myself, it would be perfect. Despite its shortcomings, I still like it.

Reviews.Title: Works for Me
Reviews.Author: sandifop "sandifop"
Reviews.Content: Your basic feature phone with menus that don't make intuitive sense. The major negatives were the speaker (average quality for 2001) and the lack of a headphone jack. I just want a phone to take bumps and make calls; for $29, this did the job.

Reviews.Title: Working phone
Reviews.Author: Wisniewski
Reviews.Content: I like it  and thought it was ok but the only issue I had was trying to change it from  Spanish to English since I did not know any  Spanish words so I had my sister help me fix it but other then that I give it B+

Reviews.Title: Tainted phone
Reviews.Author: Kenlyn Dopwell-Dowridge
Reviews.Content: From the moment I received the BLU phone in Trinidad, I saw some static lines running vertical to the right of the screen.  Knowing that it would cost me more just to send it back to the US, I kept it.  Now almost the entire screen has lines running both vertically and horizontally.  The phone has recently been giving problems to take and hold charging.It could be a lovely phone, but has not impressed me all that much since I got it.  Excellent volume for the radio though.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: The shipment with the phone came on time,the phone is well built and  has many features than a similarly priced phones, the reception and voice quality is terrific, good for older people it has larger buttons

Reviews.Title: This is a GREAT, CHEAP, GSM Phone!
Reviews.Author: C. Schlies
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a trip to Brazil.  I bought the phone and then purchased a world SIM card from another vendor.  The phone worked great while in Brazil.  I had no problems just putting in any old GSM SIM card.  In the US the phone connected with AT&T; with no issues.  In Brazil TIM Cellular worked the best for me.  While in Brazil I did set it to manual mode for finding networks and then went through the list it displayed until I found the one that worked best.  It is a very simple talk and text phone, don't expect much more for the price, but what it does do it does very well.  It will hold two SIM cards that you can switch between via menu settings, very nice!  I was never able to figure out how to turn the volume up on the ear piece but it worked for what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Love it , very simple and a good price!
Reviews.Author: oumou
Reviews.Content: Love it , very simple and a good price! send it to my family and it works great for them.

Reviews.Title: nice one
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Its smaller than it looks but we like it , works fine and its simple , good for the $$, wish it had more sound options.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Ralphie "Ralph"
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I bought these phones as gifts (stocking stuffers) for my mom and sisters....Just something extra for them to use whenever they travel and so on..As of now...there hasnt been any complains...But its only 1 month of usuage...so time will tell.What I really like is the super quick arrival of my order.Thanks so much..

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM Quad Band, 1.8" LCD Display, VGA Camera
Bluetooth
Built in FM Antenna
MP3 Player, MP4 Player
Flash Light, MicroSD up to 8GB, Li-Ion Battery 900mAh
ProductInfo.Name: BLU T172 Jenny Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Phone with Camera, Bluetooth, Built-in FM Antenna - White
